TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_M’ihu, title = M’ihu, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/M’ihu} }

S.FORM: M'ihu Itiniay i Heping Cen no Taichung ko M'ihu a niyaro', 208 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 526 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 79% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 413 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 21% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 113 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 69%, Amis 2%, Bunun 1%, Paiwan 2%, Saysiyat 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.

M'iho Itiniay i Heping Cen no Taichong ko M'iho a niyaro', 208 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 526 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 79% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 413 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 21% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 113 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 69%, Amis 2%, Bonon 1%, Paiwan 2%, Saysiyat 1%, Seediq 1%, roma 3%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'. Ira ko imeng i niyaro'. Ira ko Kiwkay i niyaro'.
